basics.name: Ian Timotheos-Pilon
basics.label: Senior AI Solution Architect | Builder | Published Author
basics.summary: I build at the edges of what's emerging. Over a decade, I've founded communities around nascent technologiesâ€”IoT Waterloo (Canada's largest IoT network), ETHWaterloo (world's largest Ethereum hackathon in 2017), and now AI Agents Waterloo. I'm drawn to the intersection of technology and human potential: leading product and AI solutions at Input Output Global, developing NeuroKick (a privacy-focused leadership sidekick), and writing "Cultivating Clarity" about discerning what matters using contextual intelligence. Whether it's organizing the world's first Agent-to-Agent Payments Hackathon or convening 400+ developers around decentralized tech, I'm energized by spotting patterns early and creating the conditions for interesting people to collide and build together.
